English classes help employees reach the level of English necessary for free communication and better carrying out project activities.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The courses are designed primarily for production staff, whose English language proficiency is in the range between A0 and B1+. To learn more about the English level system, please, go \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLND/Language+Training\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to this page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To register for English courses you should first determine your current level of English.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5418,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/97e34649-9c5a-4d7c-b4c0-a782e7edea51/learn2+.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/97e34649-9c5a-4d7c-b4c0-a782e7edea51/learn2+.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"learn2+.png\",\"name\":\"learn2+.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"97e34649-9c5a-4d7c-b4c0-a782e7edea51\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":719,\"height\":59},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can apply for English Assessment through a number of apps - just choose the most preferable for you \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/start\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/workplace/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Telescope\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Within 7 working days after that, you will receive an email asking to choose the time and date of the Assessment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why is it important?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is a wide range of EPAM internal courses (including long-term and short-term English classes). To subscribe to most of them the determined level of English is a must.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#172b4d\"}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Most customers search for new team members with an appropriate level of English. So having this information in your profile will help you to find new projects and opportunities.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#172b4d\"}}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":133934,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b3f67aea-f42f-40df-a06d-acb5246bb147/image2019-9-30_16-24-31.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b3f67aea-f42f-40df-a06d-acb5246bb147/image2019-9-30_16-24-31.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"image2019-9-30_16-24-31.png\",\"name\":\"image2019-9-30_16-24-31.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b3f67aea-f42f-40df-a06d-acb5246bb147\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":799,\"height\":275},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#172b4d\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Assessment consists of two parts: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"writing and speaking\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". program includes a theoretical part, practical tasks and trainings, and allows mentees to address their questions to mentors and receive feedback from them.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mentoring programs are divided by categories (the content of all programs is reviewed and approved by the Competence Centers) and aimed at teaching basic primary skills or new Mentoring program takes a lot of time and requires your involvement. The duration of training ranges \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"from 3 months to a year\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". If you are not sure you can handle the load, we recommend waiting until you have enough time to complete the program.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":2435,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c5e57478-4461-47ac-bf76-8fdb3cde999f/learn5.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c5e57478-4461-47ac-bf76-8fdb3cde999f/learn5.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"learn5.png\",\"name\":\"learn5.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c5e57478-4461-47ac-bf76-8fdb3cde999f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":707,\"height\":60},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLND/Become+A+Mentor\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Contribute as a mentor\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" if you would like to share your expertise and support the EPAM Mentoring program.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
